mapper.sql: BASIC_PRD_CFG_ID, ACCT_CODE, SYSTEM_CODE, BASIC_PRD_CODE, ACTIVATION_FEE, ANNUAL_FEE, ADDITIONAL_FEE, ALLOW_GW, ALLOW_DIRECT, ALLOW_WS, ALLOW_MER_BACKEND, ALLOW_SHORT_MSG, ALLOW_IVR, ALLOW_MOBILE_APP, RECOGNIZE_PERIOD, FEE_STL_MODE, REFUND_FEE_BK, LADDER_MODE, FEE_TARGET, FEE_TARGET_ACCT_NO, DEPOSIT_PER, DEPOSIT_LIMIT, REMARK, VERSION, STATUS, OPER_FLAG, EFFECT_DATE, LOSE_EFFECT_DATE, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME
mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO TCIM_MER_BASIC_PRD_CFG T USING DUAL ON(T.BASIC_PRD_CFG_ID = #{basicPrdCfgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) WHEN not MATCHED THEN insert (BASIC_PRD_CFG_ID, ACCT_CODE, SYSTEM_CODE, BASIC_PRD_CODE, ACTIVATION_FEE, ANNUAL_FEE, ADDITIONAL_FEE, ALLOW_GW, ALLOW_DIRECT, ALLOW_WS, ALLOW_MER_BACKEND, ALLOW_SHORT_MSG, ALLOW_IVR, ALLOW_MOBILE_APP, RECOGNIZE_PERIOD, FEE_STL_MODE, REFUND_FEE_BK, LADDER_MODE, FEE_TARGET, FEE_TARGET_ACCT_NO, DEPOSIT_PER, DEPOSIT_LIMIT, REMARK, VERSION, STATUS, OPER_FLAG, EFFECT_DATE, LOSE_EFFECT_DATE, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME) values (#{basicPrdCfgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{acctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{basicPrdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activationFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{annualFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{additionalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowGw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowDirect,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowWs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowMerBackend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowShortMsg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowIvr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowMobileApp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recognizePeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeStlMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundFeeBk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ladderMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeTargetAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depositPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depositLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loseEffectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE
ACTIVATION_FEE = #{activationFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANNUAL_FEE = #{annualFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDITIONAL_FEE = #{additionalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLOW_GW = #{allowGw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLOW_DIRECT = #{allowDirect,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLOW_WS = #{allowWs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLOW_MER_BACKEND = #{allowMerBackend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLOW_SHORT_MSG = #{allowShortMsg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLOW_IVR = #{allowIvr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLOW_MOBILE_APP = #{allowMobileApp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECOGNIZE_PERIOD = #{recognizePeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE_STL_MODE = #{feeStlMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFUND_FEE_BK = #{refundFeeBk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LADDER_MODE = #{ladderMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_TARGET = #{feeTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_TARGET_ACCT_NO = #{feeTargetAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT_PER = #{depositPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT_LIMIT = #{depositLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_FLAG = #{operFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECT_DATE = #{effectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOSE_EFFECT_DATE = #{loseEffectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
